name: S-38 Pistol
description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Item Type: Pistol
Class: Ballistic
Magazine Size: 15
Rate Of Fire: 450 rpm
Effective Range: 25 m
Attachments: Optics (S1), Barrel (S1), Underbarrel (S1)
Thanks to a streamlined design and a lightweight polymer frame that helps to minimize recoil, it's easy to see why the versatile and dependable S-38 from Behring has become a trusted sidearm across the Empire for both citizens and law enforcement officers.
description_cn:
制造商：贝林财团(Behring)
物品类型：手枪
类别：实弹
弹匣容量：15
射速：450 rpm
有效射程：25 米
附件：瞄具 (S1)，枪管 (S1)，下挂 (S1)
采用了流线型设计和轻巧的聚合物框架，有助于最大程度地减少后坐力，因此不难理解为什么贝林的多功能且可靠的S-38成为了整个帝国公民和执法人员值得信赖的武器。
